name: Kiss Of The Viper
help: Apply Snake Venom To Your Weapon, Increasing Physical Damage Dealt By 20 %. Changes The Additional Effect For Mug To Absorb 50% Of Damage As HP. Shares A Recast Timer With Kiss Of The Wasp, And Cannot Be Used Simultaneously With Any Other Weapon Poisons. Effect Ends Upon Reuse.
json: Apply snake venom to your weapon, increasing physical damage dealt by

no.yes: Changes the additional effect for Mug to absorb 50% of damage as HP.

yes.yes: Changes the additional effect for Mug to absorb 50% of damage as HP.

json: Shares a recast timer with Kiss of the Wasp, and cannot be used simultaneously with any other weapon poisons. Effect ends upon reuse.
